# Exploring full training dataset

```{r}
library(wordcloud2)
library(stringr)
```


```{r}
x <- training_data %>% sample_n(1e3)

x %<>%
    mutate(text = str_replace_all(text,pattern = '[.]',replacement = ' '))


tidy_x <- x %>% 
    unnest_tokens(word,text)
```

```{r}
data("stop_words")

tidy_x %<>% 
    anti_join(stop_words)
```

```{r}
tidy_x %>% 
    count(word,sort = T)
```

```{r}
tidy_x %>%
  count(word, sort = TRUE) %>%
  filter(n > 400) %>%
  mutate(word = reorder(word, n)) %>%
  ggplot(aes(word, n)) +
  geom_col() +
  xlab(NULL) +
  coord_flip()
```
